column4: can anyone tell me how id add this to my sources.list  http://honk.physik.uni-konstanz.de/~agx/linux-ppc/debian/mplayer/

http://www.ubuntulinux.org/wiki/RestrictedFormats read the info on mplayer for hoary
just put the word multiverse behind universe
also add the marrillat repo , not the crimson repo
then you have to get hte w32 codecs manually
i was just going to say that
w32codecs are in the marrilat repos
if you try them use alien to create a .deb
I have no Idea but if you create a .deb of it its easyer to remove
